Uses of Interface
com.defano.jmonet.algo.dither.Ditherer

  • Packages that use Ditherer 
    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.algo.dither  
    com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image  

    • Uses of Ditherer in com.defano.jmonet.algo.dither

      Classes in com.defano.jmonet.algo.dither that implement Ditherer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDitherer
      Abstract base class for implementers of Ditherer that operate on 24-bit, true color ARGB images.
      class  AtkinsonDitherer
      An implementation of Bill Atkinson's dithering algorithm.
      class  BurkesDitherer
      An implementation of the Burkes dithering algorithm.
      class  FloydSteinbergDitherer
      An implementation of the Floyd-Steinberg dithering algorithm.
      class  JarvisJudiceNinkeDitherer
      An implementation of the Jarvis-Judice-Ninke dithering algorithm.
      class  NullDitherer
      A no-op dithering algorithm; provides no dithering whatsoever.
      class  SierraDitherer
      An implementation of the Sierra-3 dithering algorithm.
      class  SierraLiteDitherer
      An implementation of the Sierra-Lite dithering algorithm.
      class  SierraTwoDitherer
      An implementation of the Sierra-Two (row) dithering algorithm.
      class  StuckiDitherer
      An implementation of the Stucki dithering algorithm.

    • Uses of Ditherer in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image with parameters of type Ditherer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void Transformable.reduceColor(int colorDepth, Ditherer ditherer)
      Converts the image to a reduced palette containing no more than the specified number of colors.
      default void Transformable.reduceGreyscale(int grayDepth, Ditherer ditherer)
      Converts the image to gray-scale, containing no more than the specified number of gray shades.
      Constructors in com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image with parameters of type Ditherer 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorReductionTransform(Ditherer ditherer, int colorDepth)
      Constructs a color reduction transform.
      GreyscaleReductionTransform(Ditherer ditherer, int grayDepth)
      Creates a greyscale color reduction transform.
